info.name: TLAirways Adobe Data Layer - All Attributes
info.description: Complete data layer attributes for creating data elements using Adobe Reactor API

body.raw:

{
  "_comment": "Complete list of all data layer paths for creating data elements in Adobe Launch",
  
  "pageView_Attributes": {
    "event": "adobeDataLayer[n].event",
    "pageData.pageType": "adobeDataLayer[n].pageData.pageType",
    "pageData.pageName": "adobeDataLayer[n].pageData.pageName",
    "pageData.pageCategory": "adobeDataLayer[n].pageData.pageCategory",
    "pageData.bookingStep": "adobeDataLayer[n].pageData.bookingStep",
    "pageData.pageURL": "adobeDataLayer[n].pageData.pageURL",

    "pageData.previousPage": "adobeDataLayer[n].pageData.previousPage",
    "pageData.timestamp": "adobeDataLayer[n].pageData.timestamp",
    "pageData.sections": "adobeDataLayer[n].pageData.sections"
  },
  
  "searchContext_Attributes": {
    "searchContext.searchId": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.searchId",
    "searchContext.origin": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.origin",
    "searchContext.destination": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.destination",
    "searchContext.originDestination": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.originDestination",
    "searchContext.departureDate": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.departureDate",
    "searchContext.returnDate": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.returnDate",

    "searchContext.numberOfDays": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.numberOfDays",

    "searchContext.passengers.breakdown.children.count": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.passengers.breakdown.children.count",

    "searchContext.passengers.summary": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.passengers.summary",
    "searchContext.cabinClass": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.cabinClass",
    "searchContext.tripType": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.tripType",

    "searchContext.searchCriteria.destinationAirport": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.searchCriteria.destinationAirport",

    "searchContext.searchCriteria.destinationCity": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.searchCriteria.destinationCity",
    "searchContext.searchCriteria.destinationCountry": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.searchCriteria.destinationCountry",
    "searchContext.specialDays.hasSpecialDays": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.specialDays.hasSpecialDays",
    "searchContext.revenueData.potential_revenue": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.revenueData.potential_revenue",
    "searchContext.revenueData.avg_revenue_per_user": "adobeDataLayer[n].searchContext.revenueData.avg_revenue_per_user",

    "eventData.booking.returnDate": "adobeDataLayer[n].eventData.booking.returnDate"
  },

    "eventData.sustainabilityImpact.distance": "adobeDataLayer[n].eventData.sustainabilityImpact.distance",
    "eventData.sustainabilityImpact.treesPlanted": "adobeDataLayer[n].eventData.sustainabilityImpact.treesPlanted",
    "eventData.sustainabilityImpact.carbonOffset": "adobeDataLayer[n].eventData.sustainabilityImpact.carbonOffset",
    "eventData.sustainabilityImpact.sustainabilityContribution": "adobeDataLayer[n].eventData.sustainabilityImpact.sustainabilityContribution",
    "eventData.sustainabilityImpact.impactType": "adobeDataLayer[n].eventData.sustainabilityImpact.impactType",
    "eventData.sustainabilityImpact.contributionType": "adobeDataLayer[n].eventData.sustainabilityImpact.contributionType"
  },
  
  "userContext_Attributes": {

    "userContext.userId": "adobeDataLayer[n].userContext.userId",
    "userContext.userEmail": "adobeDataLayer[n].userContext.userEmail",
    "userContext.userLoyaltyTier": "adobeDataLayer[n].userContext.userLoyaltyTier",

  },
  
  "bookingContext_Attributes": {
    "bookingContext.bookingId": "adobeDataLayer[n].bookingContext.bookingId",
    "bookingContext.pnr": "adobeDataLayer[n].bookingContext.pnr",
    "bookingContext.bookingStatus": "adobeDataLayer[n].bookingContext.bookingStatus",

  "ancillaryServices_Attributes": {

    "pricing.breakdown.totalFlightFare": "adobeDataLayer[n].pricing.breakdown.totalFlightFare",
    "pricing.breakdown.totalAncillaryFare": "adobeDataLayer[n].pricing.breakdown.totalAncillaryFare"
  },
  
  "_instructions": {
    "note1": "Replace [n] with the appropriate array index or use getState() function",
    "note2": "For arrays like products[i], loop through or use specific index",
    "note3": "All event types: pageView, searchSubmit, flightSelect, proceedToAncillaryServices, proceedToPayment, purchase",
    "note4": "All values are in plain text format (no hyphens or underscores)",
    "note5": "ProductIds: flight, seat, baggage, priorityBoarding, loungeAccess",
    "note6": "Payment methods: credit card, debit card, UPI, netbanking, wallet"
  }
}
